input.body:
Health, Technology & E4E

{{trigger['body']['data'][11]['value']}}

Hello there,

Take a look into our Digital Health world,

Warm Regards,

{{trigger['body']['data'][10]['value']}}

for the e4e Team


What Have We Been Up to Recently?

{{trigger['body']['data'][0]['value']}}

{{trigger['body']['data'][1]['value']}}





What's Happening Around Us?

{{step_27[0]}}



{{step_27[2]}}Read more here.




{{step_27[3]}}

{{step_27[5]}} Learn more here.





{{step_27[6]}}

{{step_27[8]}} Learn more here.





{{step_27[9]}}

{{step_27[11]}} Learn more here.





We’ve Got Something for Everyone!

Collect and Analyse Data with Datakojo

Tired of the cumbersome process of manually collecting, validating and analysing data? We have the right solution for you! Datakojo, a mobile data collection platform developed by eHealth4everyone, allows you to collect data in electronic forms with or without an internet connection and helps you quickly analyse your data. To use this platform for your data collection needs, visit datakojo.com.




Opportunities for you or someone you may know

Interested In The HDA Graduate Fellowship? Apply Now!

The eHealth for Everyone Foundation is accepting submissions for the Health Data Analytics (HDA) graduate fellowship. If you’re looking for an opportunity to develop your capacity in health data analytics and related areas at higher academic and research levels, this might be for you. Visit the website to read more about this fellowship and apply.






Join Our Team!

We are looking for innovative and self-motivated tech enthusiasts to join our amazing team in the following positions:

  • Data Analysts
  • Digital Engagement Intern
  • Admin Support Intern
  • Python Web Developer
  • General Manager
  • Python Data Scientist
  • People and Business Lead
  • DevOps Engineer
  • Backend Developer
  • Biz Dev Intern
  • AI/GPT Research Assistant
  • AI Assistant
  • Data Engineer
  • HR Assistant
  • General Manager
  • Software Project Manager
  • AI PM
  • PM Admin
  • VR PM

Visit our careers page to view the requirements and apply.

Useful Reads for the Month

  1. {{step_11['body'][0]['title']}}
  2. {{step_12['body'][0]['title']}}
  3. {{step_13['body'][0]['title']}}

THANK YOU FOR READING

Don’t forget to follow us on all our social media pages for daily updates.

Links on the newsletter in the order of their appearance

  2. {{trigger['body']['data'][4]['value']}}

  4. {{trigger['body']['data'][6]['value']}}
  5. http://datakojo.com/
  6. https://ehealth4everyone.com/hda-graduateresearchfellowship/
  7. https://ehealth4everyone.com/hda-graduateresearchfellowship/
  8. https://ehealth4everyone.com/careers/
  9. {{trigger['body']['data'][7]['value']}}
  10. {{trigger['body']['data'][8]['value']}}
  11. {{trigger['body']['data'][9]['value']}}

input.text:
Hello there,

I trust you have received the sample for the {{trigger['body']['data'][11]['value']}} newsletter. 

Find attached the html draft:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/{{step_6['id']}}/view?usp=drive_link

May I proceed with sending it out to the targeted audience?

Hey! @channel

The external newsletter for {{trigger['body']['data'][11]['value']}} campaign has been successfully launched

Thanks!

Hey! @channel

The external newsletter for {{trigger['body']['data'][11]['value']}} campaign has been successfully launched

Thanks!

Hello again!

The newsletter campaign was cancelled...
Process exited.

Hello again!

The newsletter campaign was cancelled...
Process exited.

input.prompt: Summarize the main ideas of the article into a single, concise, and well-structured 2-3 line paragraph within the range of 20-40 words. Eliminate filler, redundant, or non-essential language like 'Here is the article', and ensure the summary is presented in plain text without any numbering or formatting, focusing solely on clarity and coherence: {{step_21['body'][0]['text']}}
